column2: Overhead tank collapse at the site
column5: Our Site officer noticed that there was no running water today despite several attempts to pump water. On further inspection, it was discovered that the blocks supporting the overhead tank had collapsed as a result of wear and tear. The resolve is to cast new blocks to raise the tank and replace the damaged pipes.
Sanitary wares and accessories are currently being procured in preparation for installation.

column1: 1. This schedule is only a guide showing the sequence of tasks to be carried out for this project.
2. Some tasks may complete sooner or later than stated/advised
3. As work progress, new tasks may be generated and added to the schedule
4. Be rest assured that the project will still be delivered within the set period agreed upon and at the best quality standards in respective of any potential disruptions
5. A dedicated site officer will be on ground to monitor and supervise work on every scheduled work day.
5. Work hours for site officers: 9am-5pm. Except on Mondays due to our mandatory team meeting, resumption time at the site on Mondays  is 1pm
6. Kindly allow one extra week i.e Week 9 for contingency
